name: Slider with Auto layout Playground
description:
In this tutorial I teach you how to create a fully scalable and editable slider with auto layout in Figma in a fun and easy way, through a simple step by step approach.


Now you no longer have to worry about using the Detach Instance or creating multiple components to adapt your elements to your layout.


You can also watch the video tutorial I recorded on YouTube. (Note: video in Brazilian Portuguese)
